info.name: Youtube Feather Bigscreen
info.description:
A dark restyling of the YouTube Feather layout. You can access the Feather layout at : http://www.youtube.com/feather_beta  
Supports both the standard YouTube layout and Feather beta layout.
info.additionalInfo:
Version info:

5/05/2014 - Font and background changed. Channel name and subscribe button moved to save vertical space.

4/04/2014 - Changed the style to be only active on pages playing YouTube videos. Fixed the comment section to use the style's CSS properly. Brought back the footer element in the Feather view.

12/26/2013 - Fixed video sizing in standard YouTube layout

12/24/2013 - Support for standard YouTube site (non-Feather beta)

11/25/2013 - Full-screen video fixed 

11/22/2013 - First release
